attributes.action: stop the goverment getting rid of DLA
attributes.additional_details:
Please help
the gov are getting rid of of DLA to replace it with new benefit – Personal Independence Payment.the medical is going to be for everyone regardless of wether they have dla awarded for a limited period or like myself for life.this assessment is no good for mental health issues autism/aspergers etc
so please vote against DLA reform as it discriminates against many disorders/conditions
